actionCalls.name: Create_Request_Record_with_case_assignment_rule
actionCalls.label: Create Request Record with case assignment rule

assignments.name: Assign_value_in_case_record_variable
assignments.label: Assign value in case record variable

value.stringValue: Hardware Request for New Hire - Details can be found in Service Request Details section

rightValue.stringValue: This option is for Software Developers only and will require IT Approval
This option is for VPs and above and will require IT Approval

formulas.name: RegionSection
formulas.expression: If({!Docking_Station} = TRUE,{!Space}+ "Docking Station"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Monitor_Single1} = TRUE, {!Space}+"External Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Monitor_Single2} = TRUE, {!Space}+"External Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Monitor_Single} = TRUE, {!Space}+"External Monitor Single"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Monitor_Double}= TRUE, {!Space}+"External Monitor Double"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Monitor_Double1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"External Monitor Double"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired1}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Headset_Wired2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Headset Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!System_Speaker}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Desktop Speaker"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Mouse Combo Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Wireless}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Wireless2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Mouse_Wireless}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Mouse Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Mouse_Wireless2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Mouse Wireless"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Keyboard_Wired}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Keyboard Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Mouse_Wired}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Mouse Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!External_Webcam_Wired}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "External Webcam Wired"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Power_Adapter}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Power Adapter"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Power_Adapter1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Power Adapter"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Power_Adapter2}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Power Adapter"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Power_Adapter3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Power Adapter"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Printer3}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Printer"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other1}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other2}= TRUE, {!Space}+"Other"+{!NewLine}," ")+ If({!Other3}= TRUE,{!Space}+ "Other"+{!NewLine}," ")

formulas.name: RequestFormula
formulas.expression: If(NOT(ISNULL({!RequestedFor.recordName})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!RequestedFor.recordName})), "Requested For - " +{!RequestedFor.recordName} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If(NOT(ISNULL({!Requested_By})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Requested_By})), ". " + {!Requested_By} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Laptop_Type})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Laptop_Type}))), " Laptop Type - " +{!Laptop_Type} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Request_Type})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Request_Type}))), " Request Type - " +{!Request_Type} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ {!VarRequest}+ 'Hardware Accessories'+ {!NewLine} + {!RegionSection}+{!NewLine} + 'Shipping Information'+ {!NewLine} + If((NOT(ISNULL({!Region})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Region}))), " Region - " +{!Region} + {!NewLine},null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand}))), " Brand - " +{!Brand} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Additional_Information})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Additional_Information}))), "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Additional_Information_1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Additional_Information_1}))), "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information_1} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!EmailAddress.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!EmailAddress.value}))), "Email Address - " +{!EmailAddress.value} + {!NewLine},null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!EmailAddress1.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!EmailAddress1.value}))), "Email Address - " +{!EmailAddress1.value} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!CellNumber1.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!CellNumber1.value}))), "Cell Number - " +{!Country_Code_Canada.value}+{!Country_Code_India.value}+{!Country_Code_Mexico.value}+{!Country_Code_UK.value}+{!Country_Code_US.value}+({!Space1}+{!CellNumber1.value}) + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!CellNumber.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!CellNumber.value}))), "Cell Number - " +{!Country_Code_Canada.value}+{!Country_Code_India.value}+{!Country_Code_Mexico.value}+{!Country_Code_UK.value}+{!Country_Code_US.value}+ ( {!Space1}+ {!CellNumber.value}) + {!NewLine}+ {!NewLine} ,null)+ {!VarAddress}+{!NewLine}

formulas.name: VarAddress
formulas.expression: 'Shipping Address'+ {!NewLine} + If((NOT(ISNULL({!Address_1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Address_1}))), {!Space}+ "Address 1 - " +{!Address_1} +{!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Address_2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Address_2}))), {!Space}+ "Address 2 - " +{!Address_2} +{!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!City})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!City}))), {!Space}+"City - " +{!City} +{!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!State_Province})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!State_Province}))), {!Space}+"State Province - " +{!State_Province} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Zip_Postal_Code})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Zip_Postal_Code}))), {!Space}+"Zip Postal Code - " +{!Zip_Postal_Code} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Country})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Country}))), {!Space}+"Country - " +{!Country} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Address_11})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Address_11}))), {!Space}+ "Address 1 - " +{!Address_11} + {!NewLine},null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Address_22})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Address_22}))), {!Space}+ "Address 2 - " +{!Address_22} + {!NewLine},null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!City1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!City1}))), {!Space}+"City - " +{!City1} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!State_Province1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!State_Province1}))), {!Space}+"State Province - " +{!State_Province1} + {!NewLine} ,null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Zip_Postal_Code1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Zip_Postal_Code1}))), {!Space}+"Zip Postal Code - " +{!Zip_Postal_Code1} + {!NewLine},null)+ If((NOT(ISNULL({!Country1})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Country1}))), {!Space}+"Country - " +{!Country1} + {!NewLine},null)

recordLookups.name: Get_Case_Id_for_Case_Number
recordLookups.label: Get Case Id for Case Number

fields.name: Error_massage
fields.fieldText: Hardware Request was not submitted to Approval Process Please contact your salesforce system administrator.

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText: Hardware Request was not created Please contact your salesforce system administrator.

fields.name: DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Hardware Request with Case Number# {!Get_Case_Id_for_Case_Number.CaseNumber} has been created.

fields.name: Display_massage
fields.fieldText: This request can only be used for existing Billable and Non-Billable resources. If a laptop is needed for a New Hire, use the New Hire Request Form.

fields.name: Display_text
fields.fieldText: This request can only be used for existing Billable and Non-Billable resources. If a laptop is needed for a New Hire, use the New Hire Request Form.

fields.name: Type_is_Laptop
fields.fieldText:
Approval Required

This option is for Software Developers only and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Type_is_Executive
fields.fieldText:
Approval Required

This option is for VPs and above and will require IT Approval.
